raw_comment:
1. Looking at the map, I noticed that the first leaf was seen in the south and slowly moved up north. I wonder if the first leaf was seen in the south first because of the equator.
2. In the places with cities that barely have any plant life like New York city, how can you tell if the first leaf has come? Can you tell by the temputure?
ace_sentences: I noticed that the first leaf was seen in the south.
I noticed that the first leaf slowly moved north.
I wonder if the first leaf was seen in the south first because the south is closer to the equator.
Some places have cities that have almost no plant life.
New York City is such a city.
In such a city, it can be difficult to tell if the first leaf has come.
I ask how a person can tell if the first leaf has come in such a city.
I ask if a person can tell this by the temperature.
